Articles.Content: Trying to update to the latest version since I just bought it (Yay!) And was wondering if I could get a little help here? Whenever I want it to update, it says it\'s not able to connect to the update server... Maybe server might be down or something? I don\'t have a proxy on, my internet is working fine and I\'m playing Multiplayer and hosting a server for Minecraft, live streaming, so it\'s not my internet, while it might be the game. Any professional help?
More than likely the server is overloaded... too much traffic. Give it a little while and try again.

5 hours ago, phanphan said:

Whenever I want it to update, it says it\'s not able to connect to the update server...

Are you trying to use the updater from the launcher? That thing has been dead for years. You need to download a copy of the new version from wherever you bought it from.
